review: Food is good for the price. Large portions covering two meals too.

I go to this Chili's location quite frequently. Service is fair, slow in some cases from what I have noticed. Their food is delicious and the surrounding atmosphere is pleasant. The host/hostess and wait staff are very knowledgeable as well as for friendly. Friends and family of mine have reported all positive experiences. I will certainly be returning. Prices are decent, parking lot gets rather crowded because of the surrounding restaurants sharing a single lot.
Horrible service. Par food for a Chili's. Wouldn't want to go back. My boss loves it however so off we pitter patter to go eat more gross food. gotta run!
